body.name: Dove Ultra Care Conditioner Intensive Repair for Damaged Hair Conditioner with Bio-Restore Complex 12 oz
features: REPARATIVE CONDITIONER: Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to restore the appearance of damaged hair. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired
FOR DAMAGED HAIR: This nourishing conditioner for damaged hair visibly repairs different degrees of damage and stops 98% of future hair damage due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo
WITH BIO-RESTORE COMPLEX: This strengthening conditioner is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair
HOW TO USE: After shampooing, apply this hair repair conditioner to wet hair and massage, leave on for 1 minute and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Shampoo
INTENSIVE REPAIR: Dove Intensive Repair is a reparative shampoo and conditioner system that targets and visibly repairs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel of hair
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This damage repair conditioner is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove
body.description: Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to restore and repair the appearance of damaged hair. This nourishing conditioner for damaged hair visibly repairs different degrees of damage and stops 98% of future hair damage due to breakage vs. non-conditioning shampoo. This strengthening conditioner is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired. How to use: After shampooing, apply this hair repair conditioner to wet hair and massage, leave on for 1 minute and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Intensive Repair Shampoo. Suitable for daily use. This damage repair conditioner is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove. This hair care product is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection. Dove Intensive Repair is a reparative shampoo and conditioner system that targets and visibly repairs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel of hair.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #131,300 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #2,920 in Hair Conditioner

productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: If your damaged hair is in need of a pick-me-up, try washing with our Intensive Repair Shampoo, then following with our Intensive Repair Conditioner. Together, they’ll leave your hair feeling instantly nourished, strengthened and beautiful. See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Formulated with Bio-Restore Complex, Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner restores the appearance of damage on the surface of your hair. The Dove Intensive Repair System continues to improve the condition of your hair over time. With every wash, your hair is left nourished and damage is visibly repaired.

Intensive Repair Haircare system visibly repairs different degrees of damage for beautifully nourished hair from root to tip. Bio-Restore Complex Dove Intensive Repair is formulated with Bio-Restore Complex. Complete care that works in harmony with your hair. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate beauty which we define as feeling and looking your best. Real Beauty is Cruelty-Free Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This shampoo is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection - just check out its PETA-certified logo. Plus, we are now moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo, 12 oz Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner, 12 oz Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner, 12 oz Main Benefit Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo visibly repairs damage to regenerate the healthy look and feel of hair. Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner moisturizes for soft, smooth, and manageable hair. Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner locks in moisture and nourishes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really good overall
reviews.reviewText: i got a result that made me think i used a DEEP conditioner rather than a normal conditioner.the scent is fine, nothing i can't tolerate. its not special or something i like in particular. im writing this on day 2. washed and used this conditioner 24 hours ago and my hair is dry but soft and feels smooth. I have relaxed thick hair with platinum ends (bleached several times and dyed black back and forth)my hair feels so good right now. i can't believe this has the quality of a deep conditioner. it went on quite thinly. it's not a thick conditioner in my opinion, but it gave me results as if it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first thing I noticed with this conditioner was how great it smells when I first applied it in the shower - beyond that, I even noticed the scent lasting throughout the day! It leaves my hair feeling silky smooth as well. Overall, I would definitely buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been trying new conditioners for a few months because my hair was extremely dry. Some made my hair greasy, others gave it static. I wasn’t sure this would do what they claim but I have to say after one use my hair looks healthy and shiny, feels soft and so far no static or greasy looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I used this in conjunction with the matching Intensive Repair shampoo. I always try to used paired shampoo and conditioner because I think it’s the best way to see the most benefits and this conditioner is a perfect example of that. I love the smell and unlike a lot of other midline budget hair care brands, the smell was long lasting and I even was complimented on my hair smell two days after I used the conditioner. I shampoo twice and use this conditioner, leaving on for at least ten to fifteen minutes in the shower before rinsing. I usually can find on sale and I stock up while I can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry, fly-away hair like mine
reviews.reviewText: I can still hear my nephew say, uncle Bruce, your hair sure does mess up easy! It still does, but this conditioner does the best for my hair. Never too dry, has good volume, too, and it does smell good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizing conditioner
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite conditioners, always leaves my hair nice and shiny and never strips my hair of its natural oils!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This makes my hair feel like kitten fur - so soft!
reviews.reviewText: I can't stop running my fingers through my hair because it's so soft! I read about this product online, recommended by a celebrity hairdresser. I've bought so many hair products over the years - and dumped them because they just didn't work on my hair. This was so affordable I thought it was worth a try, and it performed as advertised. Even my hairdresser asked me what I was using (she only uses Matrix products) because she noticed the difference in my hair and has now told other clients about this product. You can buy it at Walmart but I think it costs a little less at Amazon.It may not work on my hair forever but for now, I absolutely love it and won't use anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but too perfumey
reviews.reviewText: My hair tangles readily when I wash it, and this conditioner really helps that. In this regard it's better than anything else I've tried. However, it's overly perfumey; I continue to smell it all day long. For that reason, I would not buy it again.
El mejor acondicionador! Tenía el cabello maltratado y con esto ya no se siente como antes. Tengo el cabello muy suaveTotalmente recomendado!
